channel.title: Help 4 reward, got this problem always
channel.description:
[code]error_game_js5connect[/code]
i got this problem when i´m running my source, and next running my client. compiled both no errors.
Im using matrix 718, people told me to change the server ip to 127.0.0.1 or something, but where do i change the server ip?

item.title: Help 4 reward, got this problem always
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

Common man, stop with this rewards shit even if people help you, you dont pay them… and on top of that its against the rules. besides your a lazy kid… your topics are [size=24pt]POSTED ALL OVER THE INTERNET AND FORUMS![/size] Take some time out of your life to read some words and click some links… for real, im getting sick of these topics because your all to lazy to work :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: Help 4 reward, got this problem always
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Firstly, no offering rewards in your posts, i’m pretty sure you were warned for that in the past.

Secondly, finding out how to change the IP isn’t very hard, if I felt like it, I could go to google and type in a few words, click a link or two, and have the answer I’m looking for, maybe you should try that.

And I understand i’ve told you this before on your other post(s), but the Moparscape community is not here to spoon feed you, you’ve made at least 10 posts in the help section, all asking simple things, that can easily be googled, or solved on your own. Try solving this on your own without asking for help, I guarantee you’ll be a better server owner.

Read full topic
item.source: Help 4 reward, got this problem always
